info.name: 加密货币（cryptocurrency）
info.description:
签名，回调等参考以下文档：

EpayApi-V2.0.0 中文文档
https://openapi.epay.com/viewset/b22b0395/ceee/437b/9fcf/05147d369fdb/view/11244241/TzkyLzf1#intro

-----
Refer to the following documents for signatures, callbacks, etc. :

EpayApi-V2.0.0 English document
https://openapi.epay.com/viewset/b22b0395/ceee/437b/9fcf/05147d369fdb/view/11244241/U16qGMZi

request.description:
代收接口-加密货币充值（USDT）

### BASIC

**Path：** /payinApi/sendCryptoTransaction

**Method：** POST

**Desc：**

代收接口-加密货币充值（USDT）

### REQUEST

**Headers：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | YES |  |

**RequestBody**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| param | object | YES |  | 参数 |
| \-epayAccount | string | YES |  | 商家登录Epay账户 |
| \-version | string | YES |  | 接口版本号 |
| \-senderEpayAccount | string | YES |  | 付款人Epay账户 |
| \-merchantName | string | YES |  | 商家名称 |
| \-merchantOrderNo | string | YES |  | 商家订单号，商家系统唯一标识 |
| \-amount | string | YES |  | 订单金额，支付金额 |
| \-paymentCurrency | string | YES |  | 支付币种 |
| \-receiveCurrency | string | YES |  | 收款币种 |
| \-chainName | string | YES |  | 加密货币链 USDT-ERC20/USDT-TRC20 |
| \-notifyUrl | string | YES |  | 接收响应地址 |
| \-remark | string | NO |  | 订单备注 |
| \-language | string | NO |  | 接口语言 |
| sign | string | NO |  | 签名 |

### RESPONSE

**Header：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| content-type | application/json;charset=UTF-8 | NO |  |

**Body：**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| sign | string | NO |  | 签名 |
| epayAccount | string | NO |  | 商家EPAY账号 |
| version | string | NO |  | 版本号 |
| code | integer | NO |  | 状态码 1：订单创建请求成功，订单实际状态根据status进行判定 |
| message | string | NO |  | 提示 |
| data | object | NO |  | 数据 |
| \-merchantName | string | NO |  | 商户名称 |
| \-senderEpayAccount | string | NO |  | 付款商户Epay账号 |
| \-notifyUrl | string | NO |  | 订单回调地址 |
| \-merchantOrderNo | string | NO |  | 商家订单号 |
| \-epayOrderNo | string | NO |  | Epay订单号 |
| \-status | string | NO |  | 订单状态 |
| \-amount | string | NO |  | 订单金额 |
| \-fee | string | NO |  | 订单费用 |
| \-currency | string | NO |  | 交易币种 |
| \-timestampgmt | string | NO |  | 时间戳 |

response.name: 代收接口-加密货币充值（USDT）

request.description:
# 代收接口-查询订单

### BASIC

**Path：** /payinApi/queryTransaction

**Method：** POST

**Desc：**

代收接口-查询订单

### REQUEST

**Headers：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | YES |  |

**RequestBody**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| param | JSONObject | YES |  | 参数 |
| ─epayAccount | string | YES |  | 商户EPAY账号 |
| ─version | string | YES |  | 版本号 |
| ─merchantOrderNo | string | YES |  | 商户订单号 |
| sign | string | YES |  | 签名 |

### RESPONSE

**Header：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| content-type | application/json;charset=UTF-8 | NO |  |

**Body：**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| sign | string | YES |  | 签名 |
| epayAccount | string | YES |  | 商家EPAY账号 |
| version | string | YES |  | 版本号 |
| code | integer | YES |  | 状态码 1：成功 |
| message | string | YES |  | 提示 |
| data | JSONObject | YES |  | 数据 |
| ─category | string | YES |  | 汇款方式：银行BANK，现金CASH |
| ─merchantOrderNo | string | YES |  | 商户订单号 |
| ─epayOrderNo | string | YES |  | Epay订单号 |
| ─pinCode | string | YES |  | 取款码 |
| ─status | string | YES |  | 状态 |
| ─amount | string | YES |  | 订单金额 |
| ─currency | string | YES |  | 订单币种 |
| ─receiveAmount | string | YES |  | 收款金额 |
| ─receiveCurrency | string | YES |  | 收款币种 |
| ─paymentAmount | string | YES |  | 付款金额 |
| ─paymentCurrency | string | YES |  | 付款币种 |
| ─rate | string | YES |  | 汇率 |
| ─fee | string | YES |  | 手续费 |
| ─extendFields | string | YES |  | 扩展字段 |
| ─rateMode | string | YES |  | 汇率模式0 美金到目标币种，1目标币种到美金 |
| ─senderInfo | string | YES |  | 付款人信息 |
| ─receiveInfo | string | YES |  | 收款人信息 |

# 加密货币提现（USDT）

### BASIC

**Path：** /payoutApi/createCryptoTransaction

**Method：** POST

**Desc：**

仅支持USDT-ERC20、USDT-TRC20钱包地址

### REQUEST

**Headers：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | YES |  |

**RequestBody**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| param | JSONObject | YES |  | 参数 |
| ─epayAccount | string | YES |  | 商家EPAY账号 |
| ─category | string | YES |  | 类型CRYPTO |
| ─notifyUrl | string | NO |  | 回调地址 |
| ─merchantOrderNo | string | YES |  | 商家订单号 |
| transactionType | string | YES |  | 交易模式：C2C |
| ─amount | string | NO |  | 金额 |
| ─currency | string | YES |  | 币种 |
| ─version | string | YES |  | 版本号 |
| ─extendFields | JSONObject | NO |  | 商家扩展字段 |
| ─receiverInfo | JSONObject | YES |  |  |
| ─chainType | string | YES |  | 协议类型：USDT-ERC20、USDT-TRC20 |
| ─address | string | YES |  | 收款钱包地址 |
| ─country | string | YES |  | 收款国家 |
| sign | string | YES |  | 签名 |

### RESPONSE

**Header：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| content-type | application/json;charset=UTF-8 | NO |  |

**Body：**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| sign | string | YES |  | 签名 |
| epayAccount | string | NO |  | 商家EPAY账号 |
| version | string | NO |  | 版本号 |
| code | integer | NO |  | 返回码 1：成功 |
| message | string | NO |  | 提示 |
| data | JSONObject | NO |  | 数据 |
| ─category | string | NO |  | 加密货币CRYPTO |
| ─merchantOrderNo | string | NO |  | 商家订单号 |
| ─epayOrderNo | string | NO |  | Epay订单号 |
| ─status | string | NO |  | 订单状态 |
| ─amount | string | NO |  | 订单金额 |
| ─currency | string | NO |  | 币种 |
| ─receiveAmount | string | NO |  | 收款金额 |
| ─rate | string | NO |  | 汇率 |
| ─fee | string | NO |  | 费用 |
| ─extendFields | string | NO |  | 商家扩展字段 |
| ─address | string | NO |  | 收款地址 |
| ─chainType | string | NO |  | 协议类型 |

| ─receiveCurrency | string | YES |  | 收款币种 |

# 代付接口-查询订单

### BASIC

**Path：** /payoutApi/queryTransaction

**Method：** POST

**Desc：**

代付接口-查询订单

### REQUEST

**Headers：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | YES |  |

**RequestBody**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| param | JSONObject | YES |  | 参数 |
| ─epayAccount | string | YES |  | 商户EPAY账号 |
| ─version | string | YES |  | 版本号 |
| ─merchantOrderNo | string | YES |  | 商户订单号 |
| sign | string | YES |  | 签名 |

### RESPONSE

**Header：**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| content-type | application/json;charset=UTF-8 | NO |  |

**Body：**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| sign | string | YES |  | 签名 |
| epayAccount | string | YES |  | 商家EPAY账号 |
| version | string | YES |  | 版本号 |
| code | integer | YES |  | 状态码 1：成功 |
| message | string | YES |  | 提示 |
| data | JSONObject | YES |  | 数据 |
| ─category | string | YES |  | 银行BANK，现金CASH，钱包EWALLET |
| ─merchantOrderNo | string | YES |  | 商家订单号 |
| ─epayOrderNo | string | YES |  | Epay订单号 |
| ─pinCode | string | YES |  | 取款码 |
| ─status | string | YES |  | 订单状态 |
| ─amount | string | YES |  | 结算金额 |
| ─currency | string | YES |  | 结算币种 |
| ─receiveAmount | string | YES |  | 收款金额（代付） |
| ─receiveCurrency | string | YES |  | 收款币种（代付） |
| ─paymentAmount | string | YES |  | 付款金额（代收） |
| ─paymentCurrency | string | YES |  | 付款币种（代收） |
| ─rate | string | YES |  | 汇率 |
| ─fee | string | YES |  | 费用 |
| ─extendFields | string | YES |  | 商家扩展字段 |
| ─rateMode | string | YES |  | 汇率模式 0：付款币种到收款币种，1：收款币种到付款币种 |

Cryptocurrency collection（USDT）

### BASIC

**Path :** /payinApi/sendCryptoTransaction

**Method :** POST

**Desc :**

Payin interface-cryptocurrency top-up (USDT)

### REQUEST

**Headers :**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | YES |  |

**RequestBody**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| param | object | YES |  | Parameter |
|   |─epayAccount | string | YES |  | Merchant Epay Account |
|   |─version | string | YES |  | Version |
|   |─senderEpayAccount | string | YES |  | Sender Epay account |
|   |─merchantName | string | YES |  | Merchant name |
|   |─merchantOrderNo | string | YES |  | Merchant order number |
|   |─amount | string | YES |  | Amount |
|   |─paymentCurrency | string | YES |  | Payment Currency |
|   |─receiveCurrency | string | YES |  | Receive Currency |
|   |─chainName | string | YES |  | Cryptocurrency chain USDT-ERC20/USDT-TRC20 |
|   |─notifyUrl | string | YES |  | Callback address |
|   |─remark | string | NO |  | Remark |
|   |─language | string | NO |  | Default language |
| sign | string | NO |  | Signature |

### RESPONSE

**Header :**

| name | value | required | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| content-type | application/json;charset=UTF-8 | NO |  |

**Body :**

| name | type | required | default | desc |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| sign | string | NO |  | Signature |
| epayAccount | string | NO |  | Merchant Epay Account |
| version | string | NO |  | Version |
| code | integer | NO |  | Status code 1 : Success |
| message | string | NO |  | Notification |
| data | object | NO |  | Data |
|   |─merchantName | string | NO |  | Merchant name |
|   |─senderEpayAccount | string | NO |  | Payment PAY account |
|   |─notifyUrl | string | NO |  |  |
|   |─merchantOrderNo | string | NO |  | Merchant order number |
|   |─epayOrderNo | string | NO |  | Epay order number |
|   |─status | string | NO |  | Epay order status |
|   |─amount | string | NO |  | Order Amount (Excluding fees) |
|   |─fee | string | NO |  | Fees |
|   |─currency | string | NO |  | Currency |
|   |─timestampgmt | string | NO |  | Timestamp |

| | ─address | string | YES | | | | ─country | string | YES | | | | transactionType | string | YES | | Type C2C | | sign | string | YES | | sign | ### RESPONSE **Header :** | name | value | required | desc | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | content-type | application/json;charset=UTF-8 | NO | | **Body :** | name | type | required | default | desc | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | sign | string | YES | | Signature | | epayAccount | string | NO | | Merchant Epay Account | | version | string | NO | | Version | | code | integer | NO | | Response Code 1 : Success | | message | string | NO | | Notification | | data | JSONObject | NO | | Data | | ─category | string | NO | | | | ─merchantOrderNo | string | NO | | | | ─epayOrderNo | string | NO | | | | ─status | string | NO | | Order Status | | ─amount | string | NO | | Payment Amount | | ─currency | string | NO | | Currency | | ─receiveAmount | string | NO | | Receive Amount | | ─rate | string | NO | | Rate | | ─fee | string | NO | | Order Fee | | ─extendFields | string | NO | | | | ─address | string | NO | | | | ─chainType | string | NO | | |

# Cancellation

### BASIC

**Path :** /payoutApi/cancelTransaction

**Method :** POST

**Desc :**

Payout interface-order cancellation

### REQUEST

**Headers :**
